name: MustSellitToday.com
overview:
MustSellitToday.com (MSiT) is an online auction website providing a framework to buy and sell items online.

MSiT allows sellers to accept any offer from any buyer at any time, speeding the buying and selling process up. To make sure sellers get paid fast, MustSellitToday.com puts buyers on the clock as soon as their offer is accepted. Buyers are required to make payment in 4-12 hours, depending on the sellersâ€™ wishes, and ratings for buyers include information about how fast they pay. If payment isnâ€™t made in the time allowed, the item goes back on sale and the offers resume. This way, buyers can pick up a bargain if they are willing to pay fast.

MustSellitToday.com charges only a flat fee:

  • 99 cents for unlimited time listing
  • FREE Want To Buy listings
  • No Final Value Charges!

**ALL LISTINGS FREE THROUGH JUNE 30th, 2009
